bibl.title: Fiscal Documents from the Muslim Conquest of Egypt. Military Supplies and Administrative Dislocation, ca 639-644.
bibl.note: The initial draft of this paper was presented at the Fourth Conference of the International Society for Arabic Papyrology (26-29 March 2009). - Introduction. - Expanded chronology (1 September 639 - 16 July 647) [Documents I-XII, in chronological order]. - Conclusion. - Avec résumés en anglais et en français.
bibl.seg: Frank R. Trombley, Fiscal Documents from the Muslim Conquest of Egypt. Military Supplies and Administrative Dislocation, ca 639-644.

The initial draft of this paper was presented at the Fourth Conference of the International Society for Arabic Papyrology (26-29 March 2009). - Introduction. - Expanded chronology (1 September 639 - 16 July 647) [Documents I-XII, in chronological order]. - Conclusion. - Avec résumés en anglais et en français.
